name: ONOS-APP-Dynamic-Widest-Path
description: Proposed an Traffic Engineering strategy for Interdomain Routing, which always selects the current widest available path for a new traffic demand , and validated it using ONOS SDN Controller. See Prelimary Report.pptx for details and demo. The following improvement is another strategy in https://github.com/Guangtong/ONOS-APP-Multipath-Bandwidth-Allocation
